00230    /*
00231    * Add a pair contribution to the virial tensor (protected).
00232    */
00233    inline void 
00234    Potential::incrementPairStress(const Vector& f, const Vector& dr, 
00235                                   Tensor& stress) const
00236    {
00237       int i, j;
00238       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00239          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00240             stress(i, j) += f[i]*dr[j];
00241          }
00242       }
00243    }
00244 
00245 }
00246 #endif
